Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder 
(PTSD) 
• Result of a traumatic event
such as a sexual/ physical
attack, unexpected death of
a loved one, accident, war,
torture, or natural disaster.
• Usually associated with
serious physical, emotional
or psychological harm/ the
t
hreat of harm
• Prevalence: 2 in 100 for the
gener
al population in SA
• Repeatedly re-living the traumatic
event through realistic nightmares
or flashbacks
